name: Change Our World
description: In an age where ESG consciousness drives decisions of businesses, investors, and consumers alike, $CHG is the next generation of environmentalism and humanitarianism driven by cryptocurrency. We aim to reduce crypto's global carbon footprint and assist companies on their path to sustainability. Our contract is driven by tokenomics, supply management, and a legal structure purpose-built for widespread adoption of our token and automatic, frictionless philanthropic giving.
